QueryResult.text: select inv.id object_instance_id, sec.user_id from inv_investments inv, odf_object_extensions oe, odf_objects o, cmn_sec_chk_user_r_v sec where inv.odf_object_code = oe.object_code and o.code = oe.object_code and oe.extension_code = 'inv' and sec.object_type = 'RECORD' and sec.permission_code = 'READ' and sec.component_code = 'INV' and (sec.object_code = o.right_code or sec.object_code = concat('odf_cst_', o.right_code)) union select sec.object_instance_id, sec.user_id from cmn_sec_chk_user_v0 sec, odf_object_extensions oe, odf_objects o, cmn_sec_objects so where sec.permission_code = 'READ' and sec.object_id = so.id and o.code = oe.object_code and oe.extension_code = 'inv' and so.object_type_code = 'RECORD' and so.component_code = 'INV' and (so.object_code = o.right_code or so.object_code = concat('odf_cst_', o.right_code))
